name: DM Auto RTL
tagline: Auto RTL all inline styles in a page using jQuery
body:
### About Auto RTL Inline Styles:
This simple script can convert any inline styles to RTL using jQuery. It is not recommended to use this simple script in pages that have both rtl and ltr inline styles.

### Author
This simple script is written by Danoosh Mir (@Danoosh).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this file? Contact me at twitter (http://twitter.com/YekNerd)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
